class.rdfs:comment: A trip on a commercial train line.
class.rdfs:label: TrainTrip

schema:arrivalPlatform.rdfs:comment: The platform where the train arrives.
schema:arrivalPlatform.rdfs:label: arrivalPlatform

schema:arrivalStation.rdfs:comment: The station where the train trip ends.
schema:arrivalStation.rdfs:label: arrivalStation

schema:departurePlatform.rdfs:comment: The platform from which the train departs.
schema:departurePlatform.rdfs:label: departurePlatform

schema:departureStation.rdfs:comment: The station from which the train departs.
schema:departureStation.rdfs:label: departureStation

schema:provider.rdfs:comment: The service provider, service operator, or service performer; the goods producer. Another party (a seller) may offer those services or goods on behalf of the provider. A provider may also serve as the seller.
schema:provider.rdfs:label: provider

schema:trainName.rdfs:comment: The name of the train (e.g. The Orient Express).
schema:trainName.rdfs:label: trainName

schema:trainNumber.rdfs:comment: The unique identifier for the train.
schema:trainNumber.rdfs:label: trainNumber
